titleStmt.title: Timothy's lesson: or, a summary relation of the historical part of Holy scripture plainly and familiarly comprized in metre, for the help of memory, and instruction of the ignorant. By E.G. Master in Arts, and physician of the hospital of St. Bartholomew, of the foundation of Queen Elizabeth, of the city of Gloucester.
Little Timothie, his lesson, a summarie relation of the historicall part of Holy Scripture
titleStmt.author: Graile, Edmond, b. ca. 1577.

titleStmt.title: Timothy's lesson: or, a summary relation of the historical part of Holy scripture plainly and familiarly comprized in metre, for the help of memory, and instruction of the ignorant. By E.G. Master in Arts, and physician of the hospital of St. Bartholomew, of the foundation of Queen Elizabeth, of the city of Gloucester.
Little Timothie, his lesson, a summarie relation of the historicall part of Holy Scripture
titleStmt.author: Graile, Edmond, b. ca. 1577.

editionStmt.edition: The fourth impression corrected and amended.

notesStmt.note: First published in 1611 as "Little Timothie, his lesson, a summarie relation of the historicall part of Holy Scripture".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
